original_text: (Now the Amalekites and the Canaanites dwelt in the valley.) Tomorrow turn you, and get you into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 골짜기에 거주하나니 너희는 내일 돌이켜 홍해 길을 따라 광야로 들어갈지니라

sentences.original_text: Now the Amalekites and the Canaanites dwelt in the valley
sentences.korean_translation: 아말렉 사람과 가나안 사람들이 골짜기에 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and get you into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea
